data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a written question by date and UIN

message: Operation 'get_/api/writtenquestions/questions/{id}' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic. Missing description entirely. Added clarity about the required ID parameter, return type, and when to use this operation versus the list endpoint for better AI agent decision-making.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a specific written question by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single written question by its unique identifier. Requires the question ID as a path parameter. Returns a complete QuestionsViewModelItem object containing the question details, answer, and metadata. Use this operation when you have a specific question ID and need full details.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Missing description entirely. Added clarity about the required ID parameter, return type, and when to use this operation versus the list endpoint for better AI agent decision-making.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a written question by date and UIN
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single written question using date and UIN (Unique Identification Number) as composite identifiers. Requires both date and UIN path parameters.
